content.rendered:
Pearl Vilas, Avu, Obosima Expressway, Imo State

Pearl Villas Owerri is in the heart of Nigeria’s entertainment district. The estate is surrounded by a lot of structural development, which provides every investor with a high Return on Investment. The estate has clean air, security, and other estate amenities.

It is a place that anyone would want to live in because it provides excellent living conditions that promote independence, dignity, and self-esteem.
Because of its proximity to Owerri Main Town, this estate is one of the most profitable investments in Imo State.

LANDMARK:

  • Deeper Life Camp Ground
  • AVU Mechanic Village
  • Auto Car Dealers association
  • Owerri Modern Market
  • Concord Hotel
  • Owerri Main Town

PROXIMITY

  • 5 mins from AVU Mechanic Village
  • 15 mins drive from Owerri Town

TOPOGRAPHY: Pearl Villas Owerri is 100% dry

DOCUMENT TITLE{ Survey & Deed of Assignment (Free from Govt Encumbrances)

COORDINATES: 651166.158mE, 704615.288Mn

ESTATE FEATURES

  • Good road network
  • Fenced and cleared land
  • Street light
  • Excellent landscape and conducive environment
  • Instant allocation. Buy and build land

PRICE:

  • OUTRIGHT: N3,000,000.00
  • 6 MONTHS – N3,350,000.00
  • 12 MONTHS – N3,700,000.00

VIDEOS:

Pearl Villas, Owerri Subscription Form
